subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Quanitta Underwood, perhaps America’s best hope for a medal in women’s boxing at the Olympics, lived through a horrific ordeal as a child.
snippet: Quanitta Underwood, perhaps America’s best hope for a medal in women’s boxing at the Olympics, lived through a horrific ordeal as a child.
